attributes.action: Condemn the sentence Francis Inglis received.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sentence handed down to Francis Inglis should be revoked, as she was only doing what any mother would have done to save there child from suffering.

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
